Package com.gcep.controller

Class UsersRESTController

java.lang.Object
com.gcep.controller.UsersRESTController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/users") @CrossOrigin public class UsersRESTController extends Object
Provides the REST service endpoints for user data operations
Version:
0.2
Author:
Gabriel Cepleanu

      JSON response

    • getDetailsFromToken

      @GetMapping("/user") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getDetailsFromToken()

      JSON response

    • registerUser

      @PostMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> registerUser(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid UserModel user)
      POST method for adding a new user. All fields must be valid.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      JSON response

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateUser(@RequestBody UserModel updated)
      PUT method for updating a specified user. User ID must be specified in the request body.
      Parameters:
      updated - The updated user information
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteUser(@PathVariable(name="id") int id)
      DELETE method for removing a specified user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      JSON response
